item.name: Agent ping
item.description: The agent always returns 1 for this item. It could be used in combination with nodata() for availability check.

item.name: Maximum number of opened files
item.description: It could be increased by using sysctrl utility or modifying file /etc/sysctl.conf.

item.name: Maximum number of processes
item.description: It could be increased by using sysctrl utility or modifying file /etc/sysctl.conf.

item.name: Number of running processes
item.description: Number of processes in running state.

item.name: Number of processes
item.description: Total number of processes in any state.

item.name: Processor load (1 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: Processor load (5 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: Processor load (15 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: Processor load (1 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: Processor load (5 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: Processor load (15 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent doing nothing.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing hardware interrupts.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: Amount of time the CPU has been waiting for I/O to complete.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that have been niced.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing software interrupts.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The amount of CPU 'stolen' from this virtual machine by the hypervisor for other tasks (such as running another virtual machine).

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running the kernel and its processes.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that are not niced.

item.name: Host name
item.description: System host name.

item.name: System information
item.description: The information as normally returned by 'uname -a'.

item.name: Number of logged in users
item.description: Number of users who are currently logged in.

item.name: Available memory
item.description: Available memory is defined as free+cached+buffers memory.

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than 20% on volume {#FSNAME}
Free inodes is less than 20% on volume {#FSNAME}

item.name: MySQL bytes received per second
item.description:
The number of bytes received from all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL bytes sent per second
item.description:
The number of bytes sent to all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL begin operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL commit operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL delete operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL insert operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL rollback operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL select operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL update operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL status
item.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.ping, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.
0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

item.name: MySQL queries per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL slow queries
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL uptime
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL version
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.version, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: nginx status server accepts
item.description: accepts

item.name: nginx status connections active
item.description: active

item.name: nginx status server handled
item.description: handled

item.name: nginx status PING
item.description: is live

item.name: nginx status QPS
item.description: qps

item.name: nginx status connections reading
item.description: reading

item.name: nginx status server requests
item.description: requests

item.name: nginx status connections waiting
item.description: waiting

item.name: nginx status connections writing
item.description: writing

item.name: php当前池子接受的请求书
php请求等待队列最高数量
redis_aof_current_rewrite_time_sec
item.description: 如果服务器正在创建 AOF 文件，那么这个域记录的就是当前的创建操作已经耗费的秒数。

item.name: redis_aof_last_bgrewrite_status
item.description: 标识是否将要在rdb save操作结束后执行 ok为1

item.name: redis_aof_pending_rewrite
item.description: 一个标志值，记录了是否有 AOF 重写操作在等待 RDB 文件创建完毕之后执行。

item.name: redis_aof_rewrite_scheduled
item.description: 一个标志值，记录了在 RDB 文件创建完毕之后，是否需要执行预约的 AOF 重写操作。

item.name: redis_evicted_keys[由于内存大小限制而驱除键个数]
item.description: 因为内存大小限制，而被驱逐出去的键的个数

item.name: redis_keyspace_hits[在main dictionary(todo)中成功查到的key个数]
redis_keyspace_misses[在main dictionary(todo)中未查到的key的个数]
latest_fork_usec[上次的fork操作使用的时间]
redis_mem_fragmentation_ratio
item.description: used_memory_rss/used_memory比例，一般情况下，used_memory_rss略高于used_memory，当内存碎片较多时，则mem_fragmentation_ratio会较大，可以反映内存碎片是否很多

item.name: rdb_current_bgsave_time_sec[rdb save操作所使用的时间]
redis_rejected_connections[超过最大客户端连接被拒绝的个数]
redis_used_memory_rss
item.description: 系统给redis分配的内存（即常驻内存）

item_prototype.name: redis-server:{#REDISPORT}:redis_rejected_connections[超过最大客户端连接被拒绝的个数]

trigger.name: Configured max number of opened files is too low on {HOST.NAME}
Configured max number of processes is too low on {HOST.NAME}
Disk I/O is overloaded on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: OS spends significant time waiting for I/O (input/output) operations. It could be indicator of performance issues with storage system.

trigger.name: Host name of zabbix_agentd was changed on {HOST.NAME}
Lack of available memory on server {HOST.NAME}
Lack of available memory on server {HOST.NAME}
Lack of free swap space on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: It probably means that the systems requires more physical memory.

trigger.name: Lack of free swap space on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: It probably means that the systems requires more physical memory.

trigger.name: php慢请求日志行数30s内大于20条
php错误日志行数30s内大于20条
Ping loss is too high on {HOST.NAME}
Processor load is too high on {HOST.NAME}
Processor load is too high on {HOST.NAME}
Response time is too high on {HOST.NAME}
Version of zabbix_agent(d) was changed on {HOST.NAME}
Zabbix agent on {HOST.NAME} is unreachable for 5 minutes
